item.description:
Please Join US for The 3rd Annual Betty Boobs Dinner Dance Fundraiser For Breast Cancer.

Join us for a buffet dinner, cash bar, raffles, silent auction, a chance at a million dollars and dancing to DJ Alex from the Down Town Sound!

Friday April 27th 2012, 6pm-11pm

Emerald Hall, 120 Bay State Drive, Braintree, MA

$30.00 per person or $250.00 to reserve a table of 10 if purchased by April 20th.

Contact Karen Mosman 617-320-5090 Lisa Evans 781-963-2901 to purchase tickets
www.avonwalk.org/goto/kam All proceeds go to Avon 2 Day walk for Breast Cancer.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have our own table(s) inside.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Betty Boobs 3rd Annual Dinner Dance Breast Cancer Fund Raiser
